caption.p: Target coverage goals for the gross tumour volume (GTV) and planning target volume (PTV) on the ARREST clinical trial

tr.td: PTV: ≥95% of the PTV to receive ≥95% of the prescription dose for every lesion.
GTV : ≥95% of the GTV to receive ≥95% of the prescription dose for every lesion.

td.p: 1. Failure to meet dose constraints listed in Additional file 1
2. Not being able to meet minimum "Acceptable” coverage for every lesion i.e.
3. < 90% of lesions meet the "Goal” target coverage criteria
